list.abs: he can do' pretty' as well and a goatee beard a more arty side , but in case you think Garnett is going soft he becomes murderous again close to the net .他可以打得“漂亮”，而他的山羊胡子又表明了他艺术的一面。但是如果你以为加内特会软弱，他会像一名谋杀犯一样凶狠地灌篮。
